ai-mil5.5.2:1.1_0: “When the Buddha spoke like this, he said,
ai-mil5.5.2:3.1_0: and he spoke to the Buddha again:
ai-mil5.5.2:3.2_0: ‘Sometimes I even eat this bowl full to the brim, or even more.
ai-mil5.5.2:3.3_0: And he told him about this.
ai-mil5.5.2:3.4_0: ‘Madam, though the blade is lost, sometimes it might not make a mouthful that’s too large, while enjoying it even more.
ai-mil5.5.2:3.5_0: When the Realized One had spoken,
ai-mil5.5.2:3.6_0: ‘When I look after this bowl, sometimes I might even eat, consume, taste, and drink it. But even though it’s time I’d never stop trying to eat it.’
ai-mil5.5.2:3.7_0: This is a bowl and robes that should be kept for you.”
ai-mil5.5.2:4.2_0: ‘Don’t fall on the back of his belly,’ he might never betrayed,
ai-mil5.5.2:4.3_0: ‘Sometimes I even eat this bowl full to the brim, or even more.
ai-mil5.5.2:4.5_0: Or they’d correctly grasp it. But the word of that is not held and doesn’t fall back on the goal of the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha.
ai-mil5.5.2:5.1_0: But when a person kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence; they cause a schism, they cause a schism in the Saṅgha; they cause a schism, fracture, and sear the Realized One.
ai-mil5.5.2:5.2_0: Shouldn’t Devadatta split the Saṅgha seemn’t united to cause a schism.
ai-mil5.5.2:5.3_0: The Buddha had spoken of many different things.
ai-mil5.5.2:5.4_0: ‘Get up, don’t fall apart,’ it might be restless.
ai-mil5.5.2:6.1_0: There, great king, when the four classes of the ascetic life, realized the four kinds of textual analysis of deeds, and realize the four kinds of textual analysis. It’s full of controlling.
ai-mil5.5.2:6.2_0: Hasn’t the Buddha made an offering of the company of the gods of the Thirty-Three after bandhānāma beforehanded?”
ai-mil5.5.2:6.3_0: ‘Get up, don’t fall apart,’ it might be restless.
ai-mil5.5.2:7.2_0: ‘Sometimes I even eat this bowl full to the brim, fierce, and workable, not radiant, not brittle, and claim to be all around by the Realized One.
ai-mil5.5.2:8.1_0: His retinue is loyal and arched harp;
ai-mil5.5.2:8.2_0: In the same way, I haven’t seen the truth of Udaya. You should practice meditation to see.
ai-mil5.5.2:8.3_0: You can’t do as kind of gem.
ai-mil5.5.2:8.4_0: In the same way, when a Realized One’s army comes to place, they don’t place restrictions on the novices.”
ai-mil5.5.2:8.5_0: “It’s good, Sir, that you should repeat what I have said.”
ai-mil5.5.2:9.1_0: The second section for recitation on the well-known stomach is finished.
